name: Current Weather Display
description: Enable users to view real-time current weather conditions for a selected location.

name: Hourly Weather Forecasts
description: Provide users with detailed hourly weather forecasts for a selected location.

name: Daily Weather Forecasts
description: Provide users with detailed daily weather forecasts for a selected location.

name: Location Selection & Management
description: Allow users to search for, select, and manage locations for which they want to view weather data.

name: Location Management
description: Enable users to add, view, edit, and remove multiple saved locations within the application.

name: Current Location Detection
description: Allow the application to automatically detect and display information relevant to the user's current geographical location.

name: User Preferences & Personalization
description: Provide users with the ability to customize application settings, including units of measurement and notification preferences.

name: Real-time Radar & Satellite Visualization
description: Enable users to view interactive, real-time radar and satellite imagery, including features like zoom, pan, and time-lapse.

name: Future Weather Forecast Visualizations
description: Provide interactive visual representations of future weather conditions, such as precipitation forecasts, temperature changes, and wind patterns over time.

name: Historical Weather Data Analysis
description: Allow users to explore and visualize historical weather data and trends, including temperature, precipitation, and other meteorological parameters over various timeframes.

name: Advanced Visualization Controls & Customization
description: Develop comprehensive controls for users to customize their weather visualizations, including layer selection, data overlays, color schemes, and unit preferences.

name: Severe Weather Warning System
description: Implement a system to deliver immediate and critical push notifications for severe weather events such as heavy rain, snow, extreme temperatures, high winds, and poor air quality.

name: Customizable Daily Forecast Notifications
description: Enable users to set up and receive personalized daily or periodic weather forecast push notifications based on their preferred locations and specific weather parameters.

name: Location-Aware Alerting
description: Develop functionality to provide proactive weather alerts and notifications relevant to the user's current location or other user-defined saved locations.

name: Notification Preferences Management
description: Allow users to manage their alert subscriptions, including enabling/disabling specific alert types, adjusting notification frequency, and selecting delivery preferences for push notifications.

name: Performance Optimization
description: Improve application speed, responsiveness, and overall performance to ensure a fast user experience.

name: Intuitive User Interface Design
description: Develop an intuitive and easy-to-use interface that allows users to effortlessly navigate and interact with the application.

name: Visual Design & Aesthetics
description: Create a visually appealing and modern user interface with consistent branding and design elements.

name: Cross-Device Responsiveness
description: Ensure the application provides a seamless and optimized user experience across various mobile devices and screen sizes.
